top_product: Top Product: Our top product is our premium wedding catering package, which includes a fully customized multi-course menu, live food counters, traditional Kerala and multi-cuisine options, professional service staff, and complete buffet setup.

This could be brides or grooms-to-be, event planners, venue managers, corporate HR teams, or families hosting large functions.
top_problem_solved: Top Problem Solved: We help clients eliminate the stress of managing food and service for large events. Many hosts struggle with coordinating multiple vendors, ensuring food quality, and delivering on guest expectations. At Mezban Caterers & Events, we provide end-to-end catering solutions—from planning menus to executing flawless service—so our clients can enjoy their event with complete peace of mind.
my_favourite_bni_story: Favourite BNI Story: My favourite BNI story is about how a single referral from a fellow member led to one of the biggest wedding catering contracts we’ve ever handled. The event was a huge success and brought in several more bookings through guest referrals. It reminded me of the true power of BNI—not just for generating business, but for building trust-based relationships that open doors to long-term growth. That one introduction turned into a chain of opportunities I wouldn’t have found on my own.

my_favourite_bni_story: Good morning BNI Maximus, My BNI story is quite unique. About five years ago, our CMD Mr. Abhilash received a call from Mr. Vikas inviting him to attend a BNI meeting. I was with him that day, and we both looked at each other wondering—what exactly is BNI? Out of curiosity, we decided to attend online. Abhilash went in, but after the meeting, we both felt—maybe this is not our cup of tea. Time passed, we grew in our own way, and BNI also grew in its own way. But as they say—God always has a plan. Years later, our close friend Mr. Sameer reintroduced us to BNI. He insisted I attend, and though I was hesitant at first, I finally joined an online meeting of the Monarch chapter. That meeting gave me a small spark. After some thinking—and a lot of Sameer’s push—I finally decided to join. And that’s how Paithrika Homes became part of BNI. Looking back, I can say it was one of the best decisions I’ve made. BNI helped me connect with amazing professionals in Trivandrum, attend trainings that re-energized me, and regain the enthusiasm I once had. Now, waking up early for a 7:30 AM meeting is no longer a task—it’s something I eagerly look forward to every week. For me, BNI is not just a network—it’s a family. I am truly grateful to be a part of it. Thank you.

name: Ragitha R
top_product: My top product includes personalized Ayurvedic wellness programs combined with Dryneedling therapy for orthopedic and sports injuries, traditional Prasavareksha enhanced with modern elements, Reiki healing, elemental acupuncture, and Ayurvedic cosmetology with customized herbal medicines. This integrated approach offers comprehensive care for restoration, pain relief, holistic healing, and natural beauty enhancement.
ideal_referral: Ideal referrals are individuals experiencing orthopedic or sports injuries seeking effective pain relief and mobility restoration through Dryneedling and Panchakarma. Also, women looking for traditional and modern Prasavareksha maternity care, clients interested in holistic healing with Reiki and elemental acupuncture, and those wanting customized Ayurvedic cosmetology treatments for natural beauty and wellness.
top_problem_solved: The top problem I solve is helping patients regain mobility and reduce pain, especially those unable to stand or walk due to orthopedic issues. Over 50 patients have experienced significant improvement and walked with ease after just one session of Panchakarma detoxification combined with Dryneedling therapy.
my_favourite_bni_story: I never knew if the law of attraction truly existed—until I experienced it myself. It all began when Sameer Sir texted me: “Doctor, would you like to join a new BNI chapter that’s about to launch?” I was taken aback. For the past month, I had been seeing Sreeraman Mooss’ status updates about his journey with the BNI Glorious chapter in Malappuram. I kept wondering—Will I ever be able to join? Who would even introduce me? And then came that unexpected message from Sameer Sir, as if the universe itself had answered my thoughts. As Paulo Coelho said, “When you truly want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.” Sameer Sir opened the door. Then Sajna Ma’am trusted me enough to take treatment from Aihika Ayurveda and even referred two of her friends, who also became part of our healing journey. And now, for the past five days, I’ve had the honor of treating Mrs. Radhika Suresh Gopi. What more could I ask for? And then came Uma Ma’am, whose trust means the world—especially as she is the proud daughter of a renowned Ayurveda Acharya, someone with deep knowledge of medicine and healing. I’m immensely grateful. Thank you, Sameer Sir, for introducing me to this whole new world and for reminding me of the mission and purpose behind Aihika Ayurveda—my dream, my child. Thank you, Sajna Ma’am, for believing in us and for your generous referrals. And thank you, Uma Ma’am, for choosing us with confidence.
